    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece()
        Blank constructor - only here because IntelliJ will generate one anyway.

      • Piece

        public Piece(boolean white,
             int x,
             int y)
        Constructor for the white squares. Status defaults to NONE.
        Parameters:
        white - Whether or not the square is white. White squares cannot be moved to.
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Piece.
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Piece.

      • Piece

        public Piece(boolean white,
             int x,
             int y,
             Piece.Status status)
        Constructor for the squares and pieces.
        Parameters:
        white - Whether or not the square is white. White squares cannot be moved to.
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Piece.
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Piece.
        status - The Status of the Piece. (NONE, WHITE, BLACK).

    • Method Detail

      • setWhite

        public void setWhite(boolean white)
        Set whether or not the square is white.
        Parameters:
        white - True is the square is white, false if the square is black.

      • isWhite

        public boolean isWhite()
        Whether or not the square is white.
        Returns:
        True is the square is white, false if the square is black.

        public Piece.Status getStatus()
        Get the Status of the Piece. (NONE, WHITE, BLACK).
        Returns:
        The Status of the Piece.

        Parameters:
